backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs for the towing service website.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries of all frontend components and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style setup defining custom OKLCH color variables and dark mode values for the theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and mounting it to the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling navigation, all content sections, footer, and the mobile CTA bar.
Sticky mobile-only call bar that appears after scrolling and links to the emergency phone number.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with call actions, service hours, service area, emergency info, and reasons to choose the towing service.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying company info, quick contact details, service list, and dynamic year attribution.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Fixed header with logo, scroll-based styling, desktop/mobile navigation, and a click-to-call button.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the homepage hero section with background image, service highlights, and call-to-action buttons.
frontend/src/components/ServiceAreaSecti: Displays service coverage information for Nellore with listed areas and contact link.
Shows a grid of towing services with icons and descriptions plus a call-for-help prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and custom theme variables for the app’s color scheme and layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and required features for building the PMK TOWING SERVICE website, including visual and functional requirements.
